message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this high-end product. It's a unique item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $9500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see that you're close to the minimum value I'm looking to get, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $8000?
